com.viaoa.html

Class OATableColumn

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.html.OAHtmlComponent
      • com.viaoa.html.OATableColumn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class OATableColumn
extends OAHtmlComponent
    represents columns within a OATable. Each column can have multiple properties, each on a different line within the column. 
        [Java Code]
    OATableColumn tc = new OATableColumn("addressType.name");
    table.add(tc);
    tc = new OATableColumn(new String[] {"addressType.name","csz"} );
    table.add(tc);
    ....
    [HTML Code]
    <td align="LEFT" valign="TOP" width="80">
        <%= table.getCellValue(row,0) %>
    </td>
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
